title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 8.11 - Transmission of travel vouchers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 8.11 - Transmission of travel vouchers

State Regulations

All travel vouchers shall be timely submitted through the
administrative finance office of the employer's department at the end of the
trip. Travel vouchers shall be signed by the claimant, his or her supervisor
and the official authorized to approve the account. Approval shall be by
authorized official other than the claimant. In his or her discretion, the

Comptroller may promulgate procedures for electronic transmission of travel
vouchers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
8.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
